channel.title: CVE Feed for Ada Support -- Ada.cx Sentry Component
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ada Support -- Ada.cx Sentry Component

item.title: CVE-2024-9410|2024-10-04T13:23:19.190Z -- ada%20support -- ada.cx%20sentry%20component
item.description: Ada.cx's Sentry configuration allowed for blind server-side request forgeries (SSRF) through the use of a data scraping endpoint.
